1.name: Universal RGB+CCT
1.description: Professional solution for creating modern lighting with the ability to control color and white light shades.
1.overview_text: RGB + CCT LED strip without dots for creating stylish lighting in any interior. Complete kit for easy installation. The ability to control both color and white light shades allows you to create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion.
1.warranty_info: The 24-month warranty covers all system components subject to proper installation and use. In case of a factory defect, we will replace the defective component free of charge. The service life is 10 years.

2.name: Adjustable White
2.description: Modern solution for creating comfortable lighting with adjustable color temperature.
2.overview_text: Smoothly adjustable white light from 2700K to 6500K. The perfect solution for cozy and functional lighting. High-quality COB strip without dots provides uniform illumination and comfort for the eyes.
2.warranty_info: The 24-month warranty covers all system components subject to proper installation and use. In case of a factory defect, we will replace the defective component free of charge. The service life is 10 years.

questions.installation_1_q: How do I prepare the ceiling before installing the LED strip?
questions.installation_1_a: The surface should be clean, dry, and degreased. Remove dust, dirt, and any contamination. If the surface is porous or uneven, it is recommended to apply masking tape first for better LED strip adhesion. The surface temperature should be at least 15°C for optimal adhesive performance.
questions.installation_2_q: How should I position the power supply and controller?
questions.installation_2_a: The power supply and controller should be placed in an accessible location for servicing. Ensure good ventilation to prevent overheating. It is recommended to install them at least 20 cm away from the LED strip and not cover them with decorative elements that might impede cooling.
questions.installation_3_q: Do I need to offset from walls when installing the strip?
questions.installation_3_a: Yes, it's recommended to offset 5-7 cm from walls. This creates more uniform lighting and prevents bright spots on the walls. The offset is also necessary to compensate for thermal expansion of the strip when heated.
questions.installation_4_q: What's the proper way to connect multiple strip segments?
questions.installation_4_a: To connect segments, use special connectors or soldering. When using connectors, make sure the contacts are clean and securely fixed. When soldering, use quality solder and don't overheat the strip. After connecting, check the reliability of the contact and functionality of all segments.
questions.technical_1_q: Can the LED strip be cut?
questions.technical_1_a: Yes, LED strips can be cut, but only at specially marked places (usually every 5 cm for RGB and 2.5 cm for white strips). The strip has special marks in the form of scissors or cut lines. Cut strictly through the center of the contact pads using sharp scissors.
questions.technical_2_q: What is the maximum length of strip from one power supply?
questions.technical_2_a: The maximum length depends on the power supply wattage and strip power consumption. For 7.2 W/m strips, the maximum length from one power supply is 10 meters; for 14.4 W/m strips - 5 meters. If a greater length is needed, use additional power supplies or signal amplifiers.
questions.technical_3_q: How do I calculate the required power supply wattage?
questions.technical_3_a: Multiply the strip length by its power per meter and add 20% reserve. For example, for a 5-meter strip with 7.2 W/m power: 5 × 7.2 = 36 W, +20% = 43.2 W. Choose a power supply with the next higher wattage, in this case 45 or 50 W.
questions.technical_4_q: Why might the LED strip flicker?
questions.technical_4_a: Flickering can occur for several reasons: insufficient power supply wattage, poor contact in connections, controller malfunction, or interference from other electrical devices. Check all connections, make sure the power supply matches the required wattage, and that there are no sources of interference nearby.
questions.warranty_1_q: What should I do if part of the strip stops working?
questions.warranty_1_a: First, check all connections and make sure the power supply is working correctly. If the problem is not there, contact our support service. In case of a factory defect, we will replace the defective strip under warranty at no cost. Keep your receipt and warranty card to confirm the purchase.
questions.warranty_2_a: The warranty covers factory defects: LED failure, strip detachment from base, power supply or controller failure during proper use. The warranty does not cover mechanical damage and cases of improper installation or operation.
questions.warranty_3_q: How can I extend the lifespan of the LED strip?
questions.warranty_3_a: For maximum lifespan: ensure good ventilation, do not exceed nominal voltage, avoid mechanical damage, clean regularly from dust, prevent overheating. With proper use, the lifespan can reach up to 10 years.
questions.delivery_1_q: How is delivery handled across Europe?
questions.delivery_1_a: Delivery is free across Europe, as the cost is already included in the product price. We use reliable transport companies DPD and GLS for delivery. Delivery time is 3-7 business days depending on the country. Each order is carefully packaged for safe transportation. You can track the delivery status through your personal account or by the shipment number.
questions.delivery_2_a: We have included the delivery cost in the price of each product to make the purchase process as transparent and convenient as possible for our customers. This allows you to immediately see the final cost of the product without additional delivery expenses, regardless of the delivery country within Europe. This approach also simplifies the ordering process and makes our prices more competitive.
questions.delivery_3_q: Which countries do you deliver to?
questions.delivery_3_a: We deliver to all European Union countries, as well as the United Kingdom, Switzerland, and Norway. Delivery times may vary depending on the country: Czech Republic - 1-2 days, neighboring countries (Slovakia, Poland, Germany, Austria) - 2-4 days, other EU countries - 3-7 days. Delivery is to your door.
questions.delivery_4_q: How do I track my order?
questions.delivery_4_a: After shipping your order, you will receive an email with a tracking number. Using this number, you can track the package's movement on the transport company's website (DPD or GLS). Additionally, our manager will inform you about key delivery stages: order confirmation, transfer to delivery service, expected delivery date.
questions.delivery_5_q: What documents are provided with delivery?
questions.delivery_5_a: With each order, you receive a complete set of documents: warranty card, installation instructions in your language, sales receipt. For companies, we provide all necessary accounting documents, including an invoice. All documentation is provided in the language of the delivery country or in English upon request.
questions.delivery_6_q: How is the product packaged for delivery?
questions.delivery_6_a: We use special protective packaging: each kit is placed in a sturdy box with shock-absorbing inserts protecting from impacts and vibration. The LED strip and electronic components are additionally protected by anti-static bags. The outer packaging has a waterproof layer and "Fragile!" marking. All components are securely fixed inside the box.
questions.delivery_7_q: What should I do if the product arrives damaged?
questions.delivery_7_a: In the unlikely event of receiving damaged goods: 1) Immediately document the damage with photos/video and note it in the delivery note. 2) Contact us by phone or email within 24 hours. 3) We will organize a free return and product replacement. All return and replacement costs are covered by us. Replacement is done as quickly as possible, usually within 1-3 business days.
questions.delivery_8_a: Yes, we can arrange express delivery for urgent orders. Within Prague, same-day delivery is available for orders placed before 12:00. For other cities in the Czech Republic and neighboring countries, next-day delivery is possible. The cost of express delivery is included in the product price. To check express delivery availability for your region, please contact us.

about.title: LED Nabor – Professional Lighting Solutions
about.subtitle: We specialize in professional LED solutions for ceiling lighting since 2012. We create quality lighting that transforms spaces and creates a cozy atmosphere.
about.how_we_work_desc: Place an order on the website, and within 5-10 days, a courier will deliver the boxes to you. They will contain LED strips, power supplies, a control unit, wires, and connectors. Everything will already be connected together. All you need to do is stick the LED strip into the ceiling recess, secure the power supply, and connect it to the 220V network.
about.no_tools_needed: You will NOT need any tools
about.no_tools_desc: Strips and components come from the warehouse to the workshop. Workstations are equipped with professional tools. You'll receive a pre-assembled kit. The strips, power supplies, and controllers will be connected together.
about.advantage_1_desc: We don't have salespeople or managers. If you call or email us, a lighting engineer will respond. He will oversee your order. The engineer is available from 10:00 to 16:00.
about.advantage_2_desc: You can be sure: your ceiling won't contain cheap, no-name Chinese products. We only work with manufacturers of well-known brands that have stood the test of time and offer official warranties (Arlight, JazzWay, LedsPower, Rexant, Wago, Electrostandart, Klus).
about.advantage_3_desc: We assemble with quality in mind. We place a contact ferrule on the end of each wire. A wire with a ferrule will never fall out of a connector. The ceiling is more likely to crumble with age than the contacts will fail.

warranty_page.title: LED Nabor Product Warranty
warranty_page.subtitle: We're confident in our product quality and offer a standard 24-month warranty
warranty_page.standard_warranty_desc: Standard warranty in accordance with EU legislation
warranty_page.technical_support_desc: Free consultation on installation and operation
warranty_page.service_life_desc: Our products have a service life of 10 years with proper use
warranty_page.what_covered: What is Covered by the Warranty
warranty_page.covered_power_supply_desc: The warranty covers all types of power supply failures, including component failures, unstable operation, and other defects.
warranty_page.covered_controller_desc: Covers controller malfunctions, including control problems, connection issues, and functionality.
warranty_page.covered_led_strip_desc: The LED strip warranty includes LED failures, brightness loss of more than 30% from the original, strip detachment from the base, and other manufacturing defects.
warranty_page.what_not_covered: What is Not Covered by the Warranty
warranty_page.not_covered_mechanical_desc: The warranty does not cover damage caused by improper handling, dropping, or other mechanical impacts.
warranty_page.not_covered_installation_desc: Damage caused by improper installation, connection to an unsuitable power source, or failure to follow installation instructions.
warranty_page.not_covered_wear_desc: Natural brightness reduction of up to 30% during the service life is not considered a warranty case.
warranty_page.important_1: To receive warranty service, you must provide a document confirming the purchase (receipt, invoice, order number).
warranty_page.important_2: The warranty period begins on the date of purchase.
warranty_page.important_3: In case of product replacement under warranty, the warranty period continues from the time of the original purchase.
warranty_page.product_registration_desc: Register your LED Nabor kit to receive technical support and notifications about new products.
warranty_page.agree_terms: I confirm that I have read and agree to the
warranty_page.success_registration: Your product has been successfully registered! A confirmation has been sent to your email.
warranty_page.error_registration: An error occurred while registering your product. Please try again later or contact our support team.
warranty_page.faq_1_q: How do I activate the standard warranty?
warranty_page.faq_1_a: The warranty is automatically activated upon purchase. Keep your receipt or order number to confirm the purchase date.
warranty_page.faq_2_q: What should I do in case of a malfunction?
warranty_page.faq_2_a: If you discover a malfunction, please contact our support service via email or phone. Our specialists will help determine the cause of the malfunction and suggest the optimal solution.

installation_guide.title: Installation Guide
installation_guide.subtitle: Step-by-step guide to installing LED strip
installation_guide.step_1_desc: Thoroughly clean the ceiling surface from dust and dirt. Degrease the areas where the strip will be mounted using an alcohol solution.
installation_guide.step_1_tip_2: Let the surface dry completely before installation
installation_guide.step_1_warning_1: Do not use aggressive cleaning agents
installation_guide.step_2_desc: Mark the ceiling, indicating the strip mounting locations and power supply position. Consider the distance to power outlets.
installation_guide.step_2_tip_2: Consider furniture placement and main lighting zones
installation_guide.step_3_desc: Gradually remove the protective layer and stick the strip following the markings. Press the strip evenly, avoiding bubbles.
installation_guide.step_3_tip_1: Do not stretch the strip during installation
installation_guide.step_3_warning_1: Do not bend the strip at sharp angles
installation_guide.step_3_warning_2: Avoid touching the LEDs with your hands

terms_page.title: Terms of Use
terms_page.description: LED Nabor's Terms of Use - rules for purchasing and using our products
terms_page.section_1_desc: These Terms of Use govern the relationship between LED Nabor (hereinafter - "Company") and users of the led-nabor.com website (hereinafter - "Website"). By using the Website, you accept these terms in full.
terms_page.section_2_desc: The Company offers LED strips and components for ceiling lighting. All products are certified and meet European quality standards. The characteristics of each product are specified in the product description on the Website.
terms_page.section_3_desc: When placing an order, you agree to provide accurate information about yourself and your delivery address. The Company is not responsible for delays or non-delivery of orders due to incorrect information.
terms_page.section_4_desc: Delivery is free throughout Europe. Delivery time is 3-7 business days. The cost of delivery is included in the product price.
terms_page.section_5_1_desc: You have the right to return the product within 14 days of receipt. The product must be in its original packaging, show no signs of use, and maintain its marketable appearance.
terms_page.section_5_2_desc: All prices are listed in euros and include VAT. We reserve the right to change prices at any time. The cost of delivery is included in the product price.
terms_page.section_5_3_desc: We deliver throughout Europe. Delivery times range from 3 to 7 business days depending on the country of delivery.
terms_page.section_6_desc: All products come with a warranty ranging from 12 to 24 months depending on the model. The warranty covers factory defects and malfunctions caused by the manufacturer. In case of a factory defect, we will replace the defective component free of charge or refund your money.
